EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-01-09 Takeaways on Gartner Conference 2018.ES-2019-01-04 MQL WBN Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Gartner Cloud Strategies Conference Key Takeaways
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-gartner-conference-2018/?utm_campaign=70157000001j50EAAQ]]>
Register Now and Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-gartner-conference-2018/?utm_campaign=70157000001j50EAAQ]]> Join Turbonomic for our Gartner IOCS 2018 Takeaways Webinar <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-gartner-conference-2018/?utm_campaign=70157000001j50EAAQ]]> on Wednesday, January 9th at 11 a.m. ET. You'll receive a concise summary of megatrends discussed at the conference, cloud-related calls to action, and recommendations for Gartner research articles that will help you formulate and drive your cloud strategies.
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-gartner-conference-2018/?utm_campaign=70157000001j50EAAQ]]>
During the 30-minute live webinar, we'll discuss:
- Top learnings from Gartner IOCS - What they mean for you and your team - What to expect in 2019
Attend and you'll be entered to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card. I hope to see you there! Regards, Andrew
